name: 'n Verlore Verstand
summary: Be prepared to be transported to a reality of dreams and nightmares. What will you discover about yourself in this journey through the subconscious?

name: Nvwa
summary: Nvwa is a Sci-Fi Strategy Game. Explore an unknown galaxy, discover alien civilization relic and incredible giants, make creatures to help you terraform the planets.

name: N v2.0
summary: The next version of N/N+ from Metanet Software is available as freeware on PC with level editor, legacy levels and two player co-op.

name: NVIDIA VR Funhouse
summary: Step right up to VR Funhouse and enter a virtual carnival full of fun and games. Be an archer with flaming arrows. Test your skill shooting skeet targets blasted from a cannon. See how many moles you can punch, whack, and much more.

name: NvmU
summary: NvmU is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for the Dream Diary Jam 2. A NASU clone for the Sega Dreamcast Visual Memory Unit. Your goal is to collect as many falling eggplants as you can to achieve a high score.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System
